item.title: 七国集团（G7）财政领导人试图淡化关税争端，寻求共识
item.description: 七大工业化民主国家集团（Group of Seven industrialized democracies）的财政领导人周三在加拿大落基山举行会议，试图淡化对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税的争议，并找到一些共同点，以保持论坛的活力。【原文：Finance leaders from the Group of Seven industrialized democracies sought on Wednesday to downplay disputes over U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs and find some common ground to keep the forum viable as they met in the Canadian Rocky Mountains.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行为资本市场部门组建新的人工智能团队
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行（Royal Bank of Canada）周三告诉路透社，该银行资本市场部已成立了一个新的人工智能和数字创新团队，押注人工智能以促进未来增长。【原文：Royal Bank of Canada's capital markets wing has established a new artificial intelligence and digital innovation team as it bets on AI to boost future growth, the Canadian lender told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 法院批准火速出售 Rite Aid 的大部分药房资产
item.description: 破产的 Rite Aid 周三获得法院批准，将关闭门店并出售大部分药房资产，分别出售给 CVS、Walgreens、Albertsons、Kroger 和 Giant Eagle 等公司。【原文：Bankrupt Rite Aid on Wednesday received court approval to close stores and sell most of its pharmacy assets in separate transactions to CVS, Walgreens, Albertsons, Kroger and Giant Eagle, among others.】

item.title: ELFA 称 4 月份美国商业设备借款下降
item.description: 美国设备租赁与融资协会（ELFA）周三称，与去年同期相比，4月份美国公司的设备投资融资借款减少了4.4%。【原文：U.S. companies borrowed 4.4% less to finance equipment investments in April compared with the same period from the year earlier, the Equipment Leasing and Finance Association (ELFA) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 阻止新墨西哥州公用事业合并的集团在 Blackstone 交易中盯上了数据中心
item.description: Blackstone Infrastructure 在新墨西哥州的数据中心计划将成为利益相关者是否质疑该私募股权投资集团以 115 亿美元拟议收购电力公司 TXNM Energy 的决定性因素，阻止 TXNM 之前合并计划的集团本周告诉路透社。【原文：Blackstone Infrastructure's plans for data centers in New Mexico will be a deciding factor in whether stakeholders challenge the private equity group's $11.5-billion proposed acquisition of electric company TXNM Energy , the group that blocked TXNM's previous merger plan told Reuters this week.】

item.title: LVMH集团阿尔诺：欧洲必须在贸易谈判中向特朗普让步
item.description: 路威酩轩集团（LVMH）首席执行官兼主席贝尔纳-阿尔诺（Bernard Arnault）周三表示，欧盟必须软化其对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）贸易要求的立场，并通过谈判达成一项避免关税和保护欧洲就业的协议。【原文：The European Union must soften its stance toward U.S. President Donald Trump's trade demands and negotiate a deal to avoid tariffs and protect European jobs, LVMH CEO and Chairman Bernard Arnault said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 微软对信息窃取恶意软件 Lumma Stealer 提起法律诉讼
item.description: 微软周三表示，其数字犯罪部门（DCU）上周对 Lumma Stealer 提起了法律诉讼，因为该部门在过去两个月中发现全球有近 40 万台 Windows 计算机感染了这种窃取信息的恶意软件。【原文：Microsoft said on Wednesday its Digital Crimes Unit (DCU) filed a legal action against Lumma Stealer last week, after it found nearly 400,000 Windows computers globally infected by the information-stealing malware in the past two months.】

item.title: 小而强大 "的美国商品监管机构又有一名专员辞职
item.description: 民主党委员克里斯汀-约翰逊（Kristin Johnson）周三表示，她计划辞去美国商品期货交易委员会的职务，成为目前由四人组成的委员会中最新一位宣布计划离开监管机构的委员。【原文：Democratic commissioner Kristin Johnson on Wednesday said she plans to resign from the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission, becoming the latest of the currently four-person commission to announce a plan to leave the regulator.】

item.title: 亚马逊为产品测试人工智能语音摘要，扩大科技巨头的人工智能推力
item.description: 亚马逊周三表示，随着科技公司继续在其平台上整合人工智能，该电子商务巨头正在部分商品详情页上测试人工智能驱动的简短音频摘要。【原文：Amazon is testing AI-powered short-form audio summaries on select product detail pages, the e-commerce giant said on Wednesday, as tech companies continue to integrate artificial intelligence across their platforms.】

item.title: OpenAI 收购 Jony Ive 的硬件创业公司，任命他为创意总监
item.description: OpenAI周三表示，将收购乔尼-艾维（Jony Ive）的初创公司io Products，并聘请这位前苹果设计总监担任创意总监，帮助打造专为人工智能时代量身定制的设备。【原文：OpenAI will acquire Jony Ive's startup io Products and bring the former Apple design chief on board as creative head to help build devices tailored for the generative artificial intelligence era, the ChatGPT maker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Citgo 拍卖会竞标者名单缩小，其余集团将提出更优惠的条件
item.description: 接近筹备工作的消息人士称，随着潜在竞购者名单的缩小，由 Contrarian Funds、Gold Reserve 和 Vitol (VITOLV.UL) 的关联公司牵头的集团正在为委内瑞拉炼油商 Citgo Petroleum 的母公司提高报价。【原文：Groups led by affiliates of Contrarian Funds, Gold Reserve and Vitol (VITOLV.UL) are working on improved offers for the parent of Venezuela-owned refiner Citgo Petroleum as the list of potential bidders narrows, sources close to the preparations said.】

item.title: 亚马逊投资者再次拒绝所有股东提案
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）的投资者在其年度会议上再次否决了所有外部股东决议，其中包括三项旨在解决这家在线零售巨头对气候变化影响的决议。【原文：Amazon.com investors at its annual meeting again rejected all outside shareholder resolutions, including three meant to address the online retail giant's impact on climate change.】

item.title: 在特朗普的关注下，格陵兰允许丹麦-法国集团开采具有绿色潜力的岩石
item.description: 格陵兰岛周三向一个丹麦-法国矿业集团颁发了为期30年的采矿许可证，该集团旨在开采一种类似月球的岩石，为铝生产提供一种气候友好型替代品。【原文：Greenland on Wednesday handed a 30-year mining permit to a Danish-French mining group aiming to extract a moon-like rock that could offer a climate-friendly alternative in aluminium production.】

item.title: 全球基金经理称，美国资产存疑，欧洲受追捧
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）和摩根大通（JPMorgan）的资产管理公司高管表示，他们正在接受更多投资者关于美国资产弹性的咨询，并帮助客户在更多潜在的贸易相关市场动荡之前将更多资金转移到欧洲。【原文：Asset managers at Goldman Sachs and JPMorgan are fielding more investor enquiries about the resilience of U.S. assets and helping clients move more money to Europe ahead of more potential trade-related market turmoil, executives said.】

item.title: 力拓的智利交易是对未经验证的技术和锂价反弹的押注
item.description: 全球矿业巨头力拓公司（Rio Tinto）将与国营铜生产商 Codelco 公司一起，牵头实施智利多年来首个涉及锂电池金属的大型项目，从而应对锂行业最大的技术挑战之一。【原文：Global miner Rio Tinto , will tackle one of the biggest technological challenges in the lithium industry as it takes the lead in Chile's first major project involving the battery metal in years, alongside state-run copper producer Codelco.】

item.title: 比特币再创新高，超越一月份最高点
item.description: 由于风险情绪在上个月关税引发的抛售之后继续改善，比特币价格在周三升至历史最高水平，超过了1月份的最高点。【原文：The price of Bitcoin rose to its highest level on record on Wednesday, eclipsing the previous high from January, as risk sentiment continues to improve after last month's tariff-induced sell-off.】

item.title: 消息人士称，意大利 CDP 与麦格理在亏损的 Open Fiber 未来发展问题上存在分歧
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，意大利国家贷款机构 CDP 及其合作伙伴麦格理（Macquarie）在亏损的光纤网络运营商 Open Fiber 的未来问题上意见不一。【原文：Italian state lender CDP and its partner Macquarie are at odds over the future of their loss-making fibre network operator Open Fiber, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 行业组织称丹麦能源设备进口中发现不明成分
item.description: 丹麦绿色电力行业组织周三表示，在丹麦能源供应网络的进口设备中发现了无法解释的电子元件，该组织还表示正在进行调查，以了解更多情况。【原文：Unexplained electronic components have been found in imported equipment for Denmark's energy supply network, industry group Green Power Denmark said on Wednesday, adding that an investigation was underway to learn more.】

item.title: 禽流感爆发后巴西实施贸易限制
item.description: 巴西农业部周三更新了限制与世界最大出口国进行鸡肉贸易的国家名单，在此之前，巴西在一家商业农场确诊了首例禽流感病例。【原文：The Brazilian Agriculture Ministry on Wednesday updated the list of countries that have placed restrictions on chicken trade with the world's largest exporter after it confirmed its first case of bird flu on a commercial farm.】

item.title: 网络威胁扰乱美国、英国和欧洲的全球企业
item.description: 全球企业都在努力应对网络和勒索软件攻击的激增，从医疗保健和金融服务到零售和监管机构，各行各业都面临着日益复杂的威胁，它们的运营受到破坏，敏感数据被泄露。【原文：Global companies are grappling with a surge in cyber and ransomware attacks, with increasingly sophisticated threat actors disrupting operations and compromising sensitive data across diverse sectors—from healthcare and financial services to retail and regulatory bodies.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，加拿大贝尔电信公司数万用户服务中断
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，加拿大电信公司 BCE 旗下的 Bell 周三为该国数万用户提供了服务。【原文：Canadian telecom firm BCE's Bell was down for tens of thousands of users in the country on Wednesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 随着质量和安全文化的改善，波音提高了 737 的生产速度
item.description: 波音公司商用飞机质量副总裁道格-阿克曼（Doug Ackerman）周二告诉记者，波音公司预计在未来几个月内将737 MAX的月产量稳定在38架。【原文：Boeing expects to stabilize 737 MAX production at 38 airplanes a month over the next couple of months, its Commercial Airplanes Vice President of Quality Doug Ackerman told reporters on Tuesday.】

item.title: Shopify 推出人工智能工具，可根据关键词创建完整的在线商店
item.description: Shopify 周三推出了一项人工智能生成功能，允许其电子商务平台上的商家通过输入描述性关键字来开设网店。【原文：Shopify , on Wednesday rolled out a generative artificial intelligence feature that would allow merchants on its e-commerce platform to set up their online stores by entering descriptive keywords.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，摩托罗拉解决方案公司接近以 45 亿美元交易 Silvus
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，摩托罗拉解决方案公司正在就以大约 45 亿美元的价格收购持股比例较低的无线射频制造商 Silvus Technologies 公司进行深入谈判。【原文：Motorola Solutions is in advanced talks to acquire closely held wireless-radio maker Silvus Technologies for around $4.5 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，欧盟瞄准商业壁垒提升竞争力
item.description: 欧盟委员会周三制定了消除欧盟内部商业壁垒的计划，以此推动提高竞争力并抵消美国关税的影响。【原文：The European Commission set out plans on Wednesday to remove barriers to business within the European Union as part of a push to boost competitiveness and counteract the impact of U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 埃利奥特和菲利普斯 66 在激烈的董事会争夺中各赢得两个席位
item.description: 在周三举行的年度股东大会上，菲利普斯 66 公司和激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）各赢得了炼油厂董事会的两个席位，为今年最大的公司董事会争斗之一画上了句号。【原文：Phillips 66 and activist investor Elliott Investment Management each won two seats on the oil refiner's board at an annual shareholders meeting on Wednesday, capping one of the biggest corporate boardroom battles of the year.】

item.title: 尽管与中国达成了短暂的贸易休战协议，但美国经济前景依然疲软
item.description: 路透社对经济学家进行的一项调查显示，尽管中美贸易战暂时降温，但美国经济前景依然疲弱，有关美国财政健康状况的争论悬而未决。【原文：The outlook for the U.S. economy remains weak despite a temporary cooling of the U.S.-China trade war, a Reuters poll of economists showed, with a debate over the country's fiscal health hanging in the balance.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪四月售出 213,325 辆配备智能辅助驾驶功能的汽车
item.description: 中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪周三表示，4月份销售了213,325辆具有智能辅助驾驶功能的汽车，占截至4月底此类汽车总销量的近一半。【原文：China's electric vehicle giant BYD said on Wednesday it sold 213,325 vehicles with smart assisted driving features in April, accounting for almost half of its total sales of such vehicles as of end-April.】

item.title: 航空公司首席执行官称美国空中交通管制系统 "令美国人失望"，呼吁采取行动
item.description: 各大航空公司首席执行官周三呼吁美国国会批准数十亿美元，对老化的美国空中交通管制系统进行现代化改造，称目前的系统 "辜负了美国人的期望"。【原文：Major airline CEOs on Wednesday called on Congress to approve billions of dollars to modernize the aging U.S. air traffic control system, saying the current system is "failing Americans."】

item.title: 中国称美国贸易谈判很重要，但多边主义是解决问题的关键
item.description: 中国周三表示，与美国的贸易谈判是弥合分歧的重要一步，但真正需要的是 "不可或缺的 "多边主义，以找到走出全球贸易动荡的途径。【原文：China said on Wednesday trade talks with the U.S. were an important step toward bridging gaps but what was really needed was "indispensable" multilateralism to find a way out of global trade turmoil.】
